story.text: MEXICO CITY Jan 2 The yield on Mexico's benchmark one-month Cetes, or T-bills, slipped by one basis point to 7.01 percent on Tuesday, despite the latest inflation data coming in higher than expected. Yields on three-month and six-month Cetes were unchanged at the central bank's weekly auction.
story.title: mexico 28 - day t - bills slips to 7 . 01 pct
